duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide admission, case management, and follow-up skilled nursing visits for home health patients.
Confer with physician in developing the initial plan of treatment based on physician's orders and initial patient assessment.
Coordinate appropriate care, encompassing various healthcare personnel and report patient care/condition/progress to patient's physician and Clinical Manager.
Prepare appropriate medical documentation on all patients and confers with other health care disciplines in providing optimum patient care.

education_certification.credential: Diploma, Associate, or Bachelor Degree in Nursing
